channel.title: Npc drops please help!
channel.description: Okay well I made a custom item called New Years Godbow and the ID is 19005 so anyways I wanted to make a new years event so I spawned some skeletons in a spot and then compiled to check if they were there and they were there. So next, I went to npc drops and put this right under the label... [code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 90 1 19005 1 [/code] so that 90=skeletons drops 19005=new years god bow and amount=1 and then i did file save and then compiled and then I killed like 10 of them and they never dropped so could someone please tell me how to fix this -thx skittle385

item.title: Npc drops please help!
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well I made a custom item called New Years Godbow and the ID is 19005 so anyways I wanted to make a new years event so I spawned some skeletons in a spot and then compiled to check if they were there and they were there. So next, I went to npc drops and put this right under the labelâ€¦

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 90 1 19005 1
so that 90=skeletons drops 19005=new years god bow and amount=1 and then i did file save and then compiled and then I killed like 10 of them and they never dropped so could someone please tell me how to fix this
-thx
skittle385
